data.name: Pimp My Cruise - Maritime Business Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Pimp My Cruise is a hardly serious game about building multi-deck extravaganzas!

Buy, Renovate, Sell, Repeat.

  • Design cruise ships based on your client's specification.
  • Build ships for Rapper, Mayor, Businessman, Oligarch, Nature-lover and more!
  • Make sure the cruise ship is weight-balanced and fits within operational limits!

Features


  • Soft fixing - cleaning, collecting trash (a mop, a trashcan) - FPP
  • Hard fixing - vessel repairs, engine repairs (a hammer, a screwdriver, a wrench) - FPP
  • Decoration - Decorating ships - like The Sims, House Flipper, Builder SImulator etc.

Limitations

  • Bouyancy
  • Load Displacement
  • Energy consumption
  • Fame
  • Money

Don't forget to have fun!

data.short_description: So you wanna be a businessman? Get fast money in an easy way? For some crazy reason you want it to be related to the sea? You've come to the right place! You only need to... Pimp my Cruise!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 570 4GB VRAM / GeForce GTX 960 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 8GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.
